message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with the problem of estimating depth from monocular video sequences, which is a common problem in computer vision. The paper proposes a novel approach that involves formulating depth estimation as a discrete-continuous optimization problem and using particle belief propagation for inference. This approach is likely to be of interest to researchers in computer vision (cs.CV), robotics (cs.RO), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and graphics (cs.GR).
